column1: best cooler for pc ive had 2 of these also ive had water cooling and aoi coolers and this beauty performs just as good nice and quiet and price has always been right

one of the best cpu coolers on the market my ryzen runs like a dream with this attached to it

absolutely amazing thermals on a 48ghz overclocked i5 6600k changed over from a 120mm clc added benefit of increasing case circulation which allowed for higher memory overclock alongside super quiet and cool cpu performance

its worth spending the extra for noctua very easy to use all parts included for almost any system runs very quietely and a massive upgrade over the wraith cooler from amd

the quality of instructions provided is fantastic too

great packaging with everything you need including thermal paste this is a big cooler so make sure you have enough room for it

performance is excellent i have managed an extra 200mhz stable overclock compared with the liquid radiator it replaced
if you go for a cpu cooler please buy this is amazing how easy can handle games like call of duty or fortnite in terms of heating wow
it was easy to install i even kept the motherboard in the case its very cool and quiet and huge the arctic p14 fan looks and performs better than the noctua fan though
great product easy to fit great packaging i have a ryzen 3700x and it is keeping the temps lower it is also very very quiet compared to the stock fan and this has two
very good cooler and i have no problems with it was a bit tricky to install but i managed to do it

its a must buy
extreme cooling very heavy excellent results be careful i was surprised from size and have to remove second fan to fit in ram but even that results are amazing and fan is quiet
best cpu air cooler hands down just make sure your case is big enough very easy to install
this is by far the best cooler i have had i used to have aio coolers but these are so much better just check your ram height otherwise you might have to lift the fan to a higher position

i am used to water cooling and i always used some sort of water cooling on my system because of noise level but this thing is quiet it is huge yes but it works really well i highly recommend it installation was not hard the instructions are well written but there are loads of videos on how to install it correctly
great cooler easy to fit its massive tho
this has outperformed my liquid cooler i could not believe it it has both fans running and im running 8 cooler over liquidand there is absolutely no noise its so quiet unbelievably quietsilent

great fan easy to install as long as you have room in the your case and height for your ram i bought low profile ram so that i could fit both 140mm fans in keeps my ryzen 3900 under 80 degrees even on pbo overclock maxing all 12 cores on prime 95 for several hours

easy to install and has great cooling capabilities you dont have to worry about your cpu running hot as this noctua cooler handles it all temps stay well below the threshold when gaming with temps about 5058°c and have a great idle temperature at about 32°c

using it with my amd ryzen 5900x with only one fan and working like a charm alsostore is fast and reliable a

did i mention that this is a big heat sink you really do need to plan any build in which you are using this but it is really really good

paired this onto a 5950x and keeps it well tamed fans are not silent but are great nonetheless moving a good volume of air fairly quietly mounting mechanism is simple was able to secure it successfully on my first attempt on my first build
this cooler is nuts ive never used a nonstock cooler and i started with the best and i regret nothing it was really easy to install too going to be keeping this bad boy for am5 and beyond

great fan unit although i cant fit both fans on my board but pretty quiet and seem not badly made either to be fair
i just keep over fan in box as a sparebackup but other than that well packaged and happy with
good job nochua nice product

a big product that provides a big improvement over standard style coolers takes up a lot of space so you need to have a large case to accommodate it using it on an amd ryzen 5 3600 cpu and its reduced the average temperature by 10 degrees great when gaming

this for me is as good as a liquida big unit but i have a full size case and fits no problem

pay attention to the measurements and make sure it fits in your pc as it is really big

keeps my 10700f with pl1 set to 255w cool at 40c idle and 60c under load it is a massive cooler
